channel.title: "Error Connecting - Retrying in..."
channel.description:
So I was able to upload a new cache to my site just fine with FTP. But now, it says for about 2 seconds:
"Requesting Title Screen"
And then:
"Error Connecting - Retrying in..." (And of course there's a countdown...)
Can someone help me please?

item.title: "Error Connecting - Retrying in..."
item.dc:creator: @ic3cr34m ic3cr34m
item.description:
@ic3cr34m wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:545183”][quote author=ic3cr34m link=topic=664064.msg4438746#msg4438746 date=1405875840]

This is typically cache related and not the server.

Run your client with a java window in the back (I believe running it with javaw.exe will show that window).
When it hits that point, show the error.

Erm, It’s not showing an error.
Do you possibly have TeamViewer sir?
[/quote]'yeah but I’m too busy/tired/hungry to get on it

Well, do you have skype possibly so I can screen share?

Because there’s nothing in the eclipse console.

Are you running the client or the server in eclipse?
You need to be checking the errors in the client.

Make sure your cache is in the correct person and that you have all the files.[/quote]

Already checked all the files (3 TIMES) for the right cache settings.
And yes I am running the client in eclipse.

Read full topic
